please_select_apartment: Please select at least one apartment
notification_title: Late Payment Notification for Electricity Bill
notification_content:
Dear Resident,

We would like to inform you that your apartment's electricity bill has not been paid. Please complete the payment as soon as possible to avoid service interruption.

Notification date: {{date}}

Sincerely,
Apartment Management Board.
name: Name
notification_title_water: Late Payment Notification for Water Bill
notification_content_water:
Dear Resident,

We would like to inform you that your apartment's water bill has not been paid. Please complete the payment as soon as possible to avoid service interruption.

Notification date: {{date}}

Sincerely,
Apartment Management Board.
invalid_date: Invalid date format. Please use yyyy-MM-dd
electricity_reading_low: Electricity reading is lower than the previous reading
water_reading_low: Water reading is lower than the previous reading
only_one_apartment: Only send notification to 1 resident at a time
